content.en: Multi-view algorithms: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to address different challenges in multi-view learning. For example, one algorithm called MED-2C respects both the consensus and complementarity principles in multi-view classification. Another algorithm, UMDS and UCA, handles distortions among view-specific samples by modeling them as a nonlinear mapping of uniform latent intact samples. These algorithms aim to improve the performance of machine learning models by effectively utilizing multiple sources of information.
content.da: Multi-view algoritmer: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at tackle diverse udfordringer inden for multi-view læring. For eksempel respekterer en algoritme kaldet MED-2C både konsensus- og komplementaritetsprincipperne i multi-view klassifikation. En anden algoritme, UMDS og UCA, håndterer forvrængninger blandt vis-specifikke prøver ved at modellere dem som en ikke-lineær mapping af ensartede latente intakte prøver. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at forbedre ydeevnen af maskinlæringsmodeller ved effektivt at udnytte flere informationskilder.
